verses.verse: {A Davidic Psalm.} {The LORD Shepherds His People} d The Lord is the one who is shepherding me; I lack nothing.
He causes me to lie down in pastures of green grass; he guides me beside quiet waters.
He revives my life; he leads me in pathways that are righteous for the sake of his name. {I. e. his reputation}
Even when I walk through a valley of deep darkness, {Or valley of the shadow of death} I will not be afraid because you are with me. Your rod and your staff they comfort me.
You prepare a table before me, even in the presence of my enemies. You anoint my head with oil; my cup overflows.

Truly, goodness and gracious love will pursue me all the days of my life, and I will remain in {MT DSS 5/6HevPs read will return to ; LXX reads and my residing will be} the Lord's Temple forever. {Lit. for the length of days}
